post.description:
Register a new user

Creates a new user account and returns a JWT token upon successful registration.

email: The email has already been taken.
password: The password confirmation does not match.

post.summary: Log in and get a JWT token
post.description:
Log in and get a JWT token

Authenticates the user and returns a JWT token if credentials are valid.

Log out the user

Logs out the currently authenticated user.

Refresh the JWT token

Generates a new JWT token based on the provided valid token.

Confirm user's password

Checks if the provided password matches the authenticated user's password.

Send password reset email

Sends a password reset link to the user's email.

Reset password

Resets the user's password using a valid token.

password: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description:
Verify user's email

Verifies the user's email using a verification token.

get.description:
Get all medical records

Returns a list of all medical records available in the system.

post.description:
Create a new medical record

Creates a new medical record for a patient with the provided health parameters.

get.description:
Get medical record details

Returns detailed information about a specific medical record.

put.description:
Update medical record

Updates an existing medical record with the provided data.

items.example: The mood must be between 1 and 10.

delete.description:
Delete medical record

Removes a specific medical record from the system.

get.description:
List all medications

Retrieves a list of all medications in the system.

info.example: Pain reliever that can reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain

post.description:
Create a medication

Creates a new medication with the provided information.

info.example: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used for treating pain, fever, and inflammation
Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used for treating pain, fever, and inflammation

get.description:
Get a medication

Retrieves information about a specific medication.

info.example: Used to treat pain, fever, or inflammation

put.description:
Update a medication

Updates an existing medication with new information.

info.example: Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections
Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections

items.example: The name may not be greater than 255 characters.
The info may not be greater than 1000 characters.

delete.description:
Delete a medication

Permanently removes a medication from the system.
